Info.Title: The Lost Bladesman
Info.Actors: Donnie Yen, Wen Jiang, Li Sun, Bing Shao
Info.Plot: The story of legendary Guan Yu crossing five passes & slaying six generals. He played a major role in the civil war that led to the collapse of Han Dynasty & the establishment of Shu Han of the 3 Kingdoms, making Liu Bei its first emperor.
